QuestData.Title: The Spring Drifter
QuestData.Description: Nobody really travels up the Ancient Passage on foot. That is just asking for a faceful of saurok if you are not careful.$b$bTell you what, Egg Shell and I were just about to set off upriver to Binan Village. Want a lift?
QuestData.LogDescription: Survive a trip on the Spring Drifter.
QuestData.CompletionText: It is always good luck to have a grummle aboard when traveling through a saurok infested cave.
QuestData.RewardText: Wheh, we made it. Welcome to Binan Village.

Objectives.Objective: Survive a ride on the Spring Drifter
